text: Your alarm goes off and you promptly wake up
Varoom can wait. Imma sleep
*3 hours pass*
You wake up again and realize that you have also missed English 106 and CS 191
You walk outside into the hallway. The hallway is empty. You plan to knock on a friend's door.
You knock on Ryan's door. He opens up the door and talks,
"Bro do you want to go to Cru this week? I think it would be a good way to spend the evening."
You and Ryan leave the residence hall and start walking on your way to the Cru meeting. You and Ryan are
confused as to the location of this week's meeting. On the way, a car pulls up in front of you. The driver
says that he thought you two looked lost and asks you if you need a ride.
You and Ryan hop into the back of the car. The driver locks the doors and suddenly starts speeding off
You start contemplating jumping out of the car.
You jump out of the car and suffer a fatal concussion

prompt: Don't jump out of the car.
text: You decide not to jump out of the car. The driver take you out into the forest and pulls you out of the car.
Ryan suggests that you make a run for it.
You and Ryan attempt to run away. The driver pulls out a handgun and shoots you in the calf. Ryan makes no
attempt to help you and successfully runs away You are now incapacitated and the driver walks towards you.

prompt: Don't make a run for it
text: The driver walks towards you. As it turns out, the driver is actually your English instructor.
You pissed him off by not showing up to class today. He informs you of this before slowly torturing you to death
The driver grabs you by the legs. You are now in excruciating pain from irritation of the gunshot wound.
As it turns out, the driver is actually your English instructor. You pissed him off by not showing up to
class today. He informs you of this before slowly torturing you to death.
You attempt to crawl away from the driver. As the driver is about to grab you by the legs, your friend Matt
swoops in with his pickup truck and runs it straight into the driver. Matt calls emergency services and
gets you proper medical attention. After being treated, you are released and sent back to your room.
You and Ryan walk to Cru and get in touch with your faith. You walk back to your room afterwards and fall asleep

prompt: Don't go to Cru with Ryan
text: You tell Ryan that you are kinda busy right now. You text Ross to see if he is up to anything afterwards but he
does not respond. You head back to your room.
You turn on your computer and put on headphones to "Relax" for a few minutes. In the process you unknowingly
make a lot of noise. Ryan knocks on the door. Unfortunately, you cannot hear him and he barges into the room.
You continue doing your business while Ryan takes a photo of you and posts it in your floor's GroupMe chat.
Ryan's post receives no likes. You pridefully finish up and go to bed.
You jump and scream and a distinct nasty smell soon eminates from your underwear. Ryan can't stand the smell
and leaves the room. You shamefully walk down the hall to clean yourself up before going to bed.
You hop into your bed and fall asleep.
Ross opens the door and says,
"Hey what's up bro. The guys and I are gonna party a bit before English,
you tryna get schmacked tonight?"
You tell Ross that you're down to get schmacked.  Ross takes you to his friends apartment. You have a few
drinks. Soon after, Ross' friend Shoujo suggest that you guys climb up to the roof of a retirement home.
In your intoxicated state, you decide to follow Shoujo, Ross, and two girls to climb up a retirement home
all the way up to the roof. As you climb up, you notice a suspicious van following you around.
You decide it's not safe and leave the roof. You call a taxi and ride back to your room.
The van does not bother you. You continue to hang out on the roof of the retirement home until you hear cop
cars advancing towards your location.
You decide to run away. Bad move. The cops chase you down and quickly put the cuffs on you. You are charged
with resisted arrest, trespassing, and many other charges.
You decide to stay where you are. The cops ask you a few questions concerning your involvement in the
situation before eventually letting you go with a warning. You walk back to your room relieved.
Despite being intoxicated, you know that climbing a retirement home with Shoujo is a stupid idea. You call a
taxi and ride back to your room.
You tell Ross that you can't get "schmacked" because you're late to church. You go back out to the hall.
